cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an stunning 2008 Honda CRV with only 20,000 miles on it. Cloth seats, power everything, 4WD, and a tow package comes installed.
This is a brand-new 2017 Toyota Tacoma. Extended cab with an extended bed, leather seats, power everything, 4WD, and a tow package comes installed.
